Hi all, I am sure this has been asked before but what the hey, I like repeating myself/others. Does anyone know of an english index for the book Toko Taikai. I am trying to make sense of the Japanese index but find it faster to search through the kanji by eye.

Any guidence would be greatly appreciated. I am expecting to have to learn to read japanese properly before too long.

cheers all

Rich Turner
